verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Heri yenu Mungu
amewaunganisha,
msitengane mkavunje
hili agano.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Aliumba wazazi wetu kale,
paradizini waitawale.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Alimwumba Adamu babu yetu,
Na Eva mzazi wetu wa kwanza.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Akasema.' Zaeni mkaenee,
Ijazeni dunia na watu.'

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Leo Mungu amewabarikia,
Mkafunge agano tukufu.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Lishikeni agano takatifu,
Siku zote a maisha yenu.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Pete yenu kwa kweli
ni muungano waivaao
wasiachane.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Enendeni wawili tangu leo,
miongoni mwa raha na taabu.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Nyumba yenu ijae upendano,
akosaye atubu mapema.

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
Na amani ya wenye
kumcha Mungu,
iwavutie nyoyo za watu.

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
Sioni, pendo,
subira na heshima,
ziwe msingi wa maisha yenu.
